name: Armajet
description: Unique 2.5D multiplayer jetpack combat that unites players around the world in competition. Cross-platform so you can access your progress and play on the go with your mobile device of choice. Updated frequently with new content and features, with good developer responsiveness!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 32-Bit Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Integrated Graphics DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 64-Bit Processor: 3 GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Dedicated Graphics DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
